mapper.sql: ID, USER_NAME, TYPE, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, PASSWORD, REALNAME, NICKNAME
mapper.select:
select * from (SELECT a.*,rownum rno FROM (select u.* from PHOIBE_USER u
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sort}) a ) t WHERE t.rno BETWEEN (#{start}*#{limit}+1) AND (#{start}*#{limit}+#{limit})
mapper.insert:
SELECT PHOIBE_USER_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL as ID from DUAL
insert into PHOIBE_USER
ID,
USER_NAME,
TYPE,
STATUS,
CREATE_TIME,
UPDATE_TIME,
PASSWORD,
REALNAME,
NICKNAME,
#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update PHOIBE_USER
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REALNAME = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NICKNAME = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update PHOIBE_USER set USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REALNAME = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NICKNAME = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select * from PHOIBE_USER where ID in (select t.USER_ID from (select USER_ID,ROWNUM rno from (select USER_ID,count(USER_ID) c from PHOIBE_DOCUMENT group by USER_ID order by c desc)) t where t.rno < 7)
